label: 163 hidden = shadow gravity
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Dark matter fraction from sterile geometry
dm_fraction = hidden / ROOTS  # 163/288 â‰ˆ 0.566

# Validation: Total mass felt = 288, visible = 125
assert hidden + visible == ROOTS
assert abs(dm_fraction - 163/288) < 1e-10
note: 163 hidden roots constitute shadow gravity; full 288 mass felt gravitationally, only 125 visible
